name: py-hydra-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A framework for elegantly configuring complex applications.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-omegaconf
dependencies.description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependencies.name: py-antlr4-python3-runtime
dependencies.description:
This package provides runtime libraries required to use parsers
generated for the Python3 language by version 4 of ANTLR (ANother Tool
for Language Recognition).

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description:
Use Lightning Apps to build everything from production-ready, multi-
cloud ML systems to simple research demos.
